SELECT DATEPART(YEAR, TxnDate) AS year,
TxnDate AS txnDate,
DATEPART(Week,TxnDate) AS txnDate,
DATEPART(Month,TxnDate) AS txnDate,
DATEPART(Quarter,TxnDate) AS txnDate,
dic.DataValue as payMethod , '三联' as payAddress, SUM (dai.TopupFreeNum) topupFreeNum, SUM (dai.TopupFreeAmount) topupFreeAmount, SUM(dai.topupNum) topupNum, SUM(dai.TopupAmount) topupAmount FROM BAR_DailySummary_Topup dai LEFT JOIN SYS_Dictionary dic ON dai.PayMethodId = dic.DataCode
dic.DictCode = 'PayMethod' and dic.DataValue = #{payMethod} and TxnDate BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
GROUP BY DATEPART(YEAR, TxnDate), TxnDate, DataValue
GROUP BY DATEPART(YEAR, TxnDate), DATEPART(Week,TxnDate), DataValue
GROUP BY DATEPART(YEAR, TxnDate), DATEPART(Month,TxnDate), DataValue
GROUP BY DATEPART(YEAR, TxnDate), DATEPART(Quarter,TxnDate), DataValue
order by DATEPART(YEAR, TxnDate), TxnDate DESC
order by DATEPART(YEAR, TxnDate), DATEPART(Week,TxnDate) DESC
order by DATEPART(YEAR, TxnDate), DATEPART(Month,TxnDate) DESC
order by DATEPART(YEAR, TxnDate), DATEPART(Quarter,TxnDate) desc
